thread.title: Wet and wild with the iPhone 6S
thread.title_full: Wet and wild with the iPhone 6S

title: Wet and wild with the iPhone 6S
text:
New video claims to show iPhone 6S’s secret super power Rod Chester National technology writer News Corp Australia Network New video claims to show iPhone 6S’s secret super power Rod Chester National technology writer News Corp Australia Network Secret identity ... The iPhone 6s could be Apple’s first phone designed to survive a dunking. Picture: Supplied. 
A VIDEO test pushing the iPhone 6S beyond its natural limits appears to show Apple has given its latest smartphone a secret super power. 
While Apple has never publicly claimed that the iPhone 6S is waterproof, a new video shows that the phone could well be designed to survive an accidental drenching or even dunking in the loo, the cause of death for countless phones. 
The video by Youtuber Zach Straley shows the iPhone 6S and the iPhone 6S Plus submerged for an hour and in working order when they’re pulled out of the water and dried off. Other Stories
